title: 4 In 1 Modern spice kit partition kitchen seasoning box 4 Portions spice box with free spoon
description:
250 ml Each Side (1000ml Modern Spice Kit)
 
- Can be used to store Spice, Salt, Pepper, Sugar, Sauces & etc.
 
- Attractive and creative design
 
- Brings you a different mood in the kitchen.
 
- Dust proof cover, effectively prevent dust intrusion.
 
- There are four compartments inside.
 
- Easy to clean
 
- Easy to open and close
 
- Very suitable for daily use
 
- 4 grid masala box with spoon
 
- 4 Grid Spice Jar
- Ergonomically designed spice kit with open cover button and handle which is easy to hold the condiment jar and to open the lid while cooking.
- Provides an ample space for storing various condiments, seasoning and spices without mixing aroma.
- Seasoning can be preserved for a long time and keep away from dust, water or bugs
that adopts lid and 4 mini spoons design.
- Product is perfectly suitable for home, dorm, kitchen, household, restaurant, etc.
- Adopted 4 separate mini jars.
- Multi-use: can be use as storage or container box for any spices.
 
- A perfect tool makes the kitchen clean and
